work.company: SoftBI 商智資訊有限公司
work.summary: Maintaining and developing new features for Wealth Management Systems for Banks.
highlights: 2006-09 ~ 2008-11 Maintaining ABN/RBS Wealth Management System and developing new functions. (Servlet, Webwork)
2005-03 ~ 2006-05 Fund System. From parsing raw data from datasource to front-end presentation. （ActionScript, Webwork)
2006-06 ~ 2007-01 CMB (招商銀行) Wealth Management System (Servlet, Spring)
2008-12 ~ 2009-12 Refactor Wealth Management System core to core product. Redesign technical framework to use Struts 2 and Spring. Also developed companies' core utility library.

work.summary: This is a small 2 people studio. I worked on various different projects. From Android to Scala web application.
highlights: Messenger - Android application that alarms user on specific text messages
KKLA online testing - Scala web application developed using Lift Framework with MySQL back-end.

Caves Drama Wonderland - Java (Struts 2/ Spring) web application which allows user to create pages of short stories for children and have ability to export to epub format. Also have it's own search engine (Solr)
Cathay Bank (國泰世華銀行) Internet Banking - Pre-project Java Script framework evaluation
SKB Enterprise Banking (新光銀行企業金融) - system maintenance

work.company: SoftBI 商智資訊有限公司
work.summary: Working on improving framework and core system. Also responsible for company internal training. Co-work with each project for most suitable framework and problem solving.
highlights: MEGA Wealth Management System/OLAP - setup whole OLAP system using Analyzer (http://web.analyzer.com.tw/) with MS SQLServer.
Rework fund data batch process to use Spring Batch.

work.summary: Maintaining and developing website application using Struts 2, Spring and MySQL.
